description: Creates a role alias. Requires permission to access the CreateRoleAlias action.

parameters.name: roleAlias
parameters.description: The role alias that points to a role ARN. This allows you to change the role without having to update the device.

parameters.name: credentialDurationSeconds
parameters.description: How long (in seconds) the credentials will be valid. The default value is 3,600 seconds. This value must be less than or equal to the maximum session duration of the IAM role that the role alias references.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata which can be used to manage the role alias. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.
